name: where can we go from here?
name_original: where can we go from here?
description:
where can we go from here?

Author/Designer: Peter

A short game made with Flick Game that explores the development of a city at the cost of its natural beauty. 

You click on the colors and they bring you to the next passage--it's linear so you aren't missing anything by clicking on red rather than yellow, for instance. 

Made for a game jam in class, total about 50 minutes to an hour of work. I am not an artist!
